message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $110. It's a great deal and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $95. It's still a good deal for both of us. What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $95, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $92?
